remarks: The dual modular pair property expressed in terms of the modular pair property, that hold in Hilbert lattices.  Remark 29.6 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 130.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: dmdmd $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A MH* B <-> ( _|_ ` A ) MH ( _|_ ` B ) ) ) $.
